#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 1e5+10;
const double eps = 1e-7;
int n,v[maxn],w[maxn],test,id[maxn],m;
double lo,hi,mid,k[maxn];
bool check(double z){
    for (int i=1; i<=n; i++) k[i]=(double)v[i]-z*(double)w[i];
    sort(k+1,k+n+1);
    double sum=0;
    for (int i=n; i>n-m; i--) sum+=k[i];
    if (sum>0) return 1; return 0;
}
int main(){
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while (test--){
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        for (int i=1; i<=n; i++) scanf("%d%d",&v[i],&w[i]),id[i]=i;
        lo=0;hi=100000.0;
        for (int k=1; k<=100; k++){
            mid=(lo+hi)/2.0;
            if (check(mid)){
                lo=mid;
            } else hi=mid;
        }
        printf("%.9lf\n",lo);
    }
}
